com.sri.ai.util.log

Class LogXTraceConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.qos.logback.core.pattern.Converter<E>
      • ch.qos.logback.core.pattern.FormattingConverter<E>
        • ch.qos.logback.core.pattern.DynamicConverter<ch.qos.logback.classic.spi.ILoggingEvent>
          • ch.qos.logback.classic.pattern.ClassicConverter
            • com.sri.ai.util.log.LogXTraceConverter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ch.qos.logback.core.spi.ContextAware, ch.qos.logback.core.spi.LifeCycle

    @Beta
public class LogXTraceConverter
extends ch.qos.logback.classic.pattern.ClassicConverter
    A logback Custom Conversion Specifier that can be used in a pattern layout to pad LogX trace message correctly and to suffix profiler information when appropriate (i.e. when exiting a level in the trace). This can be configured in a logback configuration file as follows: 
     <conversionRule conversionWord="logxtracemsg" converterClass="com.sri.ai.util.log.LogXTraceConverter" />
    and used in a Pattern Layout in the following manner: 
     <Pattern>%50.50class{0}|%logxtracemsg%n</Pattern>
    Author:
    oreilly
